action.description: The committee on CPC recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 6 Ayes: Representative(s) Matayoshi, Chun, Ilagan, Lowen, Marten, Pierick; Ayes with reservations: none; 1 Noes: Representative(s) Iwamoto; and 3 Excused: Representative(s) Ichiyama, Kong, Tam.
